attributes.action: No more referendums on the EU now we have a majority decision
attributes.additional_details: Evidence: One side (leave) wins be 1.4 million votes
attributes.background:
On the 23rd the British people used their democratic rights to vote out of the EU. The Leave side won by a clear 1.4million.
And the peoples will should be respected.
We call on HM Government to guarentee us there will be no further referundums on the matter of the UK's membership of the EU
